news.title: Himalayan Ecosystem Protection and Climate Change Guidelines
news.content: Uttarakhand High Court issues comprehensive guidelines for Himalayan ecosystem protection, addressing climate change impacts, glacier conservation, and sustainable mountain development.

news.title: Pilgrimage Tourism Safety and Environmental Management
news.content: The court mandates safety protocols and environmental management for pilgrimage tourism in Uttarakhand, ensuring visitor safety and ecological preservation.

news.title: Forest Fire Prevention and Management Systems
news.content: Uttarakhand High Court directs implementation of advanced forest fire prevention and management systems, emphasizing community participation and technology integration.
